align:
\begin{align}
 T_{--}&\equiv T_{\mu\nu}\,k^\mu k^\nu Ga
 &= \frac{2}{\sqrt{-g}}\,\frac{\delta \Gamma_{\!{\rm eff}}}{\delta g_{\mu\nu}}\,
  k_\mu k_\nu Ga
 &=-4\beta\,\sqrt{\partial_-f}\,\partial_-^2\, \frac{1}{\sqrt{\partial_-f}}.
 \label{Tmm}
\

\begin{align}
 S_L&\equiv A_{\rm eff}(0) \int_0^1\,dx^-\,s(x^+\!\!=\!0,x^-)
  \,\bigl[G(x^+\!\!=\!0,x^-) \bigr]^{n_{\rm eff}} Ga
 &\leq -\frac{1}{4}\,A_{\rm eff}(0)\,
  \Bigl[\bigl[G(x^+\!\!=\!0,x^-)\bigr]^{n_{\rm eff}}
  \Bigr]_0^1 Ga
 &=\frac{1}{4}\,\bigl(A_{\rm eff}(0)-A_{\rm eff}(1)\bigr).
\

\begin{align}
 ds_{n+2}^2&=G_{M\!N}\,dX^M dX^N Ga
 &=g_{\mu\nu}(x)\,dx^\mu dx^\nu + e^{-2\phi(x)}\,\tilde{g}_{ij}(y) dy^i\,dy^j,
\

\begin{align}
 S_{n+2}\bigl[G_{M\!N}(x,y)\bigr]
  &=\frac{1}{16\pi G_{n+2}}\,\int\,d^2 x\,d^n y\,
  \sqrt{-G}\,R_GGa
 &\rightarrow
  \frac{1}{16\pi G_2}\,
  \int\,d^2x\,\sqrt{-g}\,e^{-n\phi}\,
  \Bigl[ R+n(n-1)\Bigl(\bigl(\nabla\phi\bigr)^2+e^{2\phi}\Bigr)\Bigr]Ga
 &\equiv S^{\rm DG}\bigl[g_{\mu\nu}(x),\phi(x)\bigr].
\

\begin{align}
 T^{\rm DG}_{--}&\equiv T^{\rm DG}_{\mu\nu}\,k^\mu k^\nuGa
 &=\frac{2}{\sqrt{-g}}\,\frac{\delta S^{\rm DG}}{\delta g_{\mu\nu}}\,
  k_\mu k_\nuGa
 &=-\frac{n}{8\pi}\,e^{-n\phi}\,e^\phi\,\partial_-^2\,e^{-\phi}. 
\
